g1.title: Entity Framework Core Adapter
g1.notes: Complete EF Core integration with real database connectivity, full ORM capabilities, paging, transactions, and migrations support

g2.title: Dapper High-Performance Adapter
g2.notes: Production-ready micro-ORM with real database connections, bulk operations, stored procedures, and performance optimization

g3.title: JSON.NET Serialization System
g3.notes: Complete serialization system with custom converters, performance metrics, validation, and all TuskTsk data types support

g4.title: Connection Management & Transactions
g4.notes: Production-ready connection pooling, distributed transactions, ACID compliance, health monitoring, and performance optimization

performance_metrics.current_query_performance: Optimized with connection pooling, retry policies, and caching
performance_metrics.current_transaction_safety: Full ACID compliance with distributed transaction support
